    • 方法详细资料

      • convertYUV420_NV21toARGB8888

        public static int[] convertYUV420_NV21toARGB8888(byte[] data,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
        Converts YUV420 NV21 to ARGB8888
        参数:
        data - byte array on YUV420 NV21 format.
        width - pixels width
        height - pixels height
        返回:
        a ARGB8888 pixels int array. Where each int is a pixels ARGB.

      • isExternalStorageDocument

        public static boolean isExternalStorageDocument(android.net.Uri uri)
        参数:
        uri - The Uri to check.
        返回:
        Whether the Uri authority is ExternalStorageProvider.

      • isDownloadsDocument

        public static boolean isDownloadsDocument(android.net.Uri uri)
